argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringcbas.c | |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | ringcbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | ringcbas.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_ringcbas | |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Hom ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_ringchomfval | |- ( ph -> ( Hom ` C ) = ( RingHom |` ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_rhmresfn | |- ( ph -> ( Hom ` C ) Fn ( B X. B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` C ) |
| 9 | 8, 2, 5 | #P_fnhomeqhomf | |- ( ( Hom ` C ) Fn ( B X. B ) -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) ) |
